description:
NTS Map: 082G01This a very easy trail in  Waterton Lakes National Park
 that anyone can do in a hour or less. The trail is virtually flat, ending at Blakiston Falls and its several viewing platforms. This trail is actually the beginning of the much longer South Kootenay Pass trail to Twin Lakes in the interior of Waterton.Current conditions:
directions: From the parking area at Red Rock Canyon, head downstream about 100m and cross the bridge. Cross the next bridge (immediately), then turn right. Falls are 1km along this trail.
title: Blakiston Falls
